languages.text: Тело лежит лицом вниз, цепляясь скрюченными пальцами за землю. Женщине переломили позвоночник и позволили ползти в ложной надежде на спасение.

traits.locale_text: Тело лежит лицом вниз, цепляясь скрюченными пальцами за землю. Женщине переломили позвоночник и позволили ползти в ложной надежде на спасение.

languages.text: The body is lying face down, its crooked fingers clinging to the ground. This woman had her spine broken, then she was allowed to crawl in the vain hope of escape.
languages.original_text: Тело лежит лицом вниз, цепляясь скрюченными пальцами за землю. Женщине переломили позвоночник и позволили ползти в ложной надежде на спасение.

traits.locale_text: The body is lying face down, its crooked fingers clinging to the ground. This woman had her spine broken, then she was allowed to crawl in the vain hope of escape.
The body is lying face down, its crooked fingers clinging to the ground. This woman had her spine broken, then she was allowed to crawl in the vain hope of escape.

The body is lying face down, its crooked fingers clinging to the ground. This woman had her spine broken, then she was allowed to crawl in the vain hope of escape.
The body is lying face down, its crooked fingers clinging to the ground. This woman had her spine broken, then she was allowed to crawl in the vain hope of escape.

languages.text: El cadáver está boca abajo y sus dedos retorcidos aún se aferran al suelo. A esta mujer le rompieron la columna vertebral y luego le dejaron reptar con la esperanza vana de escapar.
languages.original_text: The body is lying face down, its crooked fingers clinging to the ground. This woman had her spine broken, then she was allowed to crawl in the vain hope of escape.

traits.locale_text: El cadáver está boca abajo y sus dedos retorcidos aún se aferran al suelo. A esta mujer le rompieron la columna vertebral y luego le dejaron reptar con la esperanza vana de escapar.

languages.text: 这具尸体趴在地上，蜷曲的手指紧紧地贴着地面。这个女人生前被打断了脊骨，之后折磨她的人允许她在地上爬行，徒劳地试图逃跑。
languages.original_text: The body is lying face down, its crooked fingers clinging to the ground. This woman had her spine broken, then she was allowed to crawl in the vain hope of escape.

traits.locale_text: 这具尸体趴在地上，蜷曲的手指紧紧地贴着地面。这个女人生前被打断了脊骨，之后折磨她的人允许她在地上爬行，徒劳地试图逃跑。

languages.text: 身体はうつ伏せで、折れ曲がった指が地面にしがみついている。この女は背骨を折られてもなお脱出しようというわずかな希望を抱いて這ったようだ。
languages.original_text: The body is lying face down, its crooked fingers clinging to the ground. This woman had her spine broken, then she was allowed to crawl in the vain hope of escape.

traits.locale_text: 身体はうつ伏せで、折れ曲がった指が地面にしがみついている。この女は背骨を折られてもなお脱出しようというわずかな希望を抱いて這ったようだ。

languages.text: Die Leiche liegt mit dem Gesicht nach unten, die verkrampften Finger krallen sich am Boden fest. Die Wirbelsäule der Frau wurde gebrochen, und dann ließ man sie noch ein Stück kriechen, in der sinnlosen Hoffnung auf Flucht.
languages.original_text: The body is lying face down, its crooked fingers clinging to the ground. This woman had her spine broken, then she was allowed to crawl in the vain hope of escape.

traits.locale_text: Die Leiche liegt mit dem Gesicht nach unten, die verkrampften Finger krallen sich am Boden fest. Die Wirbelsäule der Frau wurde gebrochen, und dann ließ man sie noch ein Stück kriechen, in der sinnlosen Hoffnung auf Flucht.

languages.text: Le cadavre est allongé face contre terre et s'accroche au sol de ses doigts tordus. Après lui avoir cassé la colonne vertébrale, on a laissé cette femme tenter vainement de fuir en rampant.
languages.original_text: The body is lying face down, its crooked fingers clinging to the ground. This woman had her spine broken, then she was allowed to crawl in the vain hope of escape.

traits.locale_text: Le cadavre est allongé face contre terre et s'accroche au sol de ses doigts tordus. Après lui avoir cassé la colonne vertébrale, on a laissé cette femme tenter vainement de fuir en rampant.

languages.text: Yüzüstü uzanan cesedin yamulmuş parmakları, yeri avuçluyor. Kadının omurgası kırılmış, ardından son bir kaçma umuduyla yerlerde sürünmesine izin verilmiş.
languages.original_text: The body is lying face down, its crooked fingers clinging to the ground. This woman had her spine broken, then she was allowed to crawl in the vain hope of escape.

traits.locale_text: Yüzüstü uzanan cesedin yamulmuş parmakları, yeri avuçluyor. Kadının omurgası kırılmış, ardından son bir kaçma umuduyla yerlerde sürünmesine izin verilmiş.
